fields.headline: Annotated solutions for Genius 141
fields.bodyText: * Clues (11) with wordplay producing a surplus letter, in order reading BAD LANGUAGE ** All the solutions to these clues are an anagram (bad) of a language Across 1** Brontë BRO/NT/E [BRETON] 4** shingle S  INGLE [ENGLISH; Hove = Sussex CCC ground] 9** alpine E PLAIN (anag) [NEPALI] 10* numpties [B] NU[b]/MP/TIES 11 Cinerama AMERICAN (anag) 12 Euston NOT SUE (rev) 13 noises off NO  ES/OFF 14* tone [A] [a]T/ONE 15** sere S(ucculent)/ERE [ERSE] 17** personate SO A PRETEN(ce) (anag) [ESPERANTO] 20** ragmen (f)RAGMEN(t) [GERMAN] 22* neatened [D] NE<[d]ATE/N(ot)>ED 23** monarchs OH MAN/S(tate)/R(eally)/C(lueless) (anag) [ROMANSCH] 24* isises [L] gIR[l] IS ESsential (hidden) 25 dratted D(emocrat)/RATTED 26** pathos P(itiful)/ATHOS [PASHTO; ref Three Musketeers] Down 1** Belgian LIEG(e) (anag) in BAN [BENGALI] 2 olivenite OIL I’VE TEN (anag) 3* teenage [A] TE[a]/(m)ENAGE 5** himself SELF after HI(t)/(pro)M(ote) [FLEMISH; Will Self] 6* notes [N] SE[n]T ON (rev) 7 lie down LIE/DOWN 8* unsavouriness [G] [g]UN/S(hake) + IS A NERVOUS (anag) 14* tsarevich [U] T<[u]/S/A>REVI/CH(ild) 16* enamour [A] M[a]E AROUN(d) (anag) 17 panache PAN/AC<(trop)H(y)>E 18 ocarina O(ver)CA + RAIN (anag) 19* elevens [G] E  VENS 21* meant [E] ME + ANT[e]
